function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on 5g technology for remote medical procedures may result in communication failures or network interruptions, leading to delays or errors in treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g technology for telemedicine and tele-treatment may lead to insufficient training and preparedness among medical staff, increasing the risk of errors and misuse of technology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to screen suspected infectors due to large-scale and fast-moving population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of workers to implement lockdown policy due to home quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact during traditional screening methods leading to infection risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g network for data collection and transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithm for temperature measurement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and data security concerns with smart monitors at home doors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots for surveillance and enforcement of lockdown policies may lead to privacy concerns and violations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact and potential transmission of the virus may occur during the enforcement of lockdown policies by unmanned aerial vehicles uav and robots.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale data transmission and analysis through the 5g network may pose cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources due to pandemic and logistics challenges","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in meeting basic living needs due to lockdown policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of work and production due to pandemic and lockdown policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g video and ar glasses for remote medical care may lead to overreliance on technology and reduced in-person interaction, impacting patient care and doctor-patient relationships.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based intelligent service robots may result in reduced human interaction, potentially impacting social connections and mental health of patients and visitors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misappropriation of medical materials due to lack of supervision and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g-based driverless vehicles and unmanned distribution robots for delivery may lead to increased potential for disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High engagement with 5g applications may lead to increased social interaction and close contact, potentially increasing disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based telemedicine for medical services may lead to increased dependency and potential strain on the telemedicine infrastructure.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g-based systems for remote work and education may contribute to increased dependence on technology for human interaction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based robots and unmanned vehicles for medical care and delivery may reduce the need for human presence, potentially impacting human labor and employment in these sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of 5g-based technologies may lead to increased reliance on efficient but vulnerable digital infrastructure, posing a risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-definition, no delay video consultation in the hospital may lead to over-reliance on remote healthcare and delay in seeking in-person medical attention for critical conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interactive live broadcast of tourist attractions may contribute to a false sense of security and encourage travel, potentially leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote meetings and online education may lead to reduced social interaction and physical activity, impacting mental health and overall well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through contact-based tasks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on remote operations for on-site tasks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources in severe epidemic areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in transmission synchronization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supervision of charitable materials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive and diverse 5g-based robot systems in hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High network capacity for concurrent communication and data transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources in severely affected areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact as a key channel of infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale population movement causing infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to remote interaction and reduced spatial barriers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misdiagnosis or delayed treatment in telemedicine due to potential information loss or distortion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for reduced focus on disease prevention and social distancing due to lifelike remote experiences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of unstructured data from terminal sensors to the cloud platform in real-time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of high-definition images and videos and huge volume data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact of persons in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious routines of the covid-19 virus are respiratory and close contact, increasing the risk of transmission in spatialized environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay of transmission and information loss in de-spatialized environments, impacting the experience of tele-operation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of exposure to infectious diseases in tele-surgery due to the involvement of remote doctors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Theoretical model of how 5g enables covid-19 prevention and control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of novel and creative applications of digital technologies in pandemic control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Grounded from 212 cases which applied 5g to combat against the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
